name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max - 256GB Titanium
description: Forged in titanium, the iPhone 15 Pro Max features a textured matte glass back and the A17 Pro chip for next-level performance. Capture stunning photos in low light with the 48MP main camera and enjoy all-day battery life on Saudi's 5G networks. USB-C support included.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra AI Smartphone
description: Unleash new levels of creativity and productivity with Galaxy AI. The S24 Ultra comes with a built-in S Pen, a durable titanium frame, and a 200MP camera system that captures reality with absolute precision. Perfect for business and photography enthusiasts in the region.

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14 Gaming Laptop
description: Dominate the competition with the ROG Zephyrus G14. Powered by AMD Ryzen 9 and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060, this compact powerhouse delivers ultra-smooth graphics on a 120Hz Nebula Display. Perfect for gamers on the go. AniMe Matrix LED display on lid.

name: Gucci GG Marmont Matelassé Shoulder Bag
description: A structured leather chain shoulder bag with a softly structured shape and an oversized flap closure with Double G hardware. The sliding chain strap can be worn multiple ways, changing between a shoulder and a top handle bag. Made in Italy.

name: Men's Classic Swiss Automatic Watch
description: A timeless masterpiece featuring a stainless steel case, sapphire crystal glass, and a precise Swiss automatic movement. This water-resistant luxury timepiece is the perfect accessory for the modern gentleman in Dammam. Features a date window and luminous hands.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console (Slim Edition)
description: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high-speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio. The new Slim design packs powerful gaming technology into a sleek and compact console perfect for your living room setup. Includes Astro's Playroom pre-installed.

name: Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long
description: Curl. Shape. Smooth and hide flyaways. With no extreme heat. Re-engineered attachments harness Enhanced Coanda airflow to create your styles. Ideal for chest-length or longer hair. Comes in Vinca Blue and Rosé storage case.

name: LG 34'' UltraWide Monitor 144Hz
description: Expand your workspace and gaming field of view with this UltraWide QHD monitor. IPS technology with sRGB 99% color gamut, HDR 10, and AMD FreeSync ensures fluid motion and vibrant colors for content creators and gamers. Split screen capable.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) USB-C
description: Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation than the previous generation. Spatial Audio takes immersion to a remarkably personal level. The MagSafe Charging Case now features a speaker and lanyard loop for easy tracking. Dust, sweat, and water resistant.

name: Nike Air Jordan 1 High OG 'Chicago'
description: The sneaker that started it all. The Air Jordan 1 High OG returns in the classic Chicago colorway. Built with premium leather and the iconic swoosh, these sneakers provide legendary style and comfort for the streets of Jeddah. High-top silhouette with air-sole unit for cushioning.

name: Anker Prime 27,650mAh Power Bank
description: Never run out of battery during your desert trips or flights. This massive capacity power bank features 250W output, capable of charging laptops and phones simultaneously. Includes a smart digital display to monitor power levels. Airline safe.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Classic Sunglasses
description: Currently one of the most iconic sunglass models in the world, Ray-Ban Aviator Classic sunglasses were originally designed for U.S. Aviators in 1937. They provide great styling, exceptional quality, and comfort with UV protection. Gold frame with green classic G-15 lenses.

name: Luxury Black Chiffon Abaya with Gold Embroidery
description: Elevate your modest fashion wardrobe with this premium black chiffon Abaya. Featuring intricate gold embroidery along the sleeves and hem, this piece offers a flowing, elegant silhouette suitable for both casual outings and formal events in Riyadh evenings. Comes with a matching Shayla.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Performance Mouse
description: Meet the mouse remotely reinvented. Feel the moment of your workflow with even more precision, tactility, and performance, thanks to Quiet Clicks and 8,000 DPI track-on-glass scanning. Ergonomic silhouette.

name: JBL Flip 6 Portable Waterproof Speaker
description: Your adventure companion. The JBL Flip 6 delivers powerful JBL Original Pro Sound with exceptional clarity thanks to its 2-way speaker system. It's waterproof and dustproof (IP67), so you can bring it anywhere in any weather. 12 hours of playtime.

name: Adidas Yeezy Slide 'Onyx'
description: The Yeezy Slide features injected EVA foam for lightweight durability, while the soft top layer in the footbed offers immediate step-in comfort. The outsole utilizes strategic groove placement for optimal traction and style. Ideal for home or casual wear.

name: Traditional White Saudi Thobe - Premium Cotton
description: Expertly tailored from high-quality Japanese cotton, this traditional white Thobe offers breathability and comfort for the hot Saudi climate. Features a structured collar and refined cuffs for a sharp, professional look. Easy iron fabric.

name: Oversized Beige Hoodie - Streetwear Collection
description: Stay cozy and stylish with this heavyweight cotton blend hoodie in a neutral beige tone. Features a dropped shoulder design and kangaroo pocket, perfect for the modern streetwear aesthetic popular in Riyadh. Anti-pilling fabric.

name: Designer Leather Belt with Silver Buckle
description: Crafted from genuine full-grain leather, this durable belt features a sleek brushed silver buckle. A versatile accessory that pairs perfectly with both formal trousers and casual jeans. Available in various waist sizes.

name: Silk Scarf with Geometric Arabesque Print
description: Add a touch of sophistication to any outfit with this 100% silk scarf featuring a modern geometric Arabesque print. Soft to the touch and versatile, it can be styled as a hijab, neck scarf, or bag accessory. Dimensions: 90cm x 90cm.
